豎.definition: to erect; vertical; vertical stroke (in Chinese characters)

豎井.definition: vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)

豎直.definition: vertical; to erect; to set upright; vertical stroke in Chinese characters; young servant (old)

豎立.definition: to erect; to set upright; to stand

豎起.definition: to erect (a tent etc); to prick up (one's ears); to raise (one's eyebrows); to stick up (one's thumb); to turn up (one's collar); (of a bird) to puff up (one's feathers)

豎起大拇指.definition: to give a thumbs-up; to express one's approval

豎起耳朵.definition: to prick up one's ears; to strain to hear sth

豎鉤.definition: vertical stroke with a hook at the end (in Chinese characters)
